        <script><![CDATA[editorRole = getRoleID("catalog_editor");
tableRole = getRoleID(current.table_name + "_user");
syncEditors();

function syncEditors() {
	var scur = new GlideRecord("service_category_user_role");
	scur.addQuery("category", current.sys_id);
	scur.query();
	while (scur.next())
		scur.deleteRecord();
	
	var editorArr = current.editors.split(",");
	
	for (var i = 0; i < editorArr.length; i++) {
		if (editorArr[i] == "")
			continue;
		
		addRoleToUser(editorRole, editorArr[i]);
		addRoleToUser(tableRole, editorArr[i]);
	}
}

function addRoleToUser(role, user) {
	if (role == null)
		return;
	
	var userRole = createUserRole(role, user);
	var u = new GlideRecord("service_category_user_role");
	u.user = user;
	u.category = current.sys_id;
	u.user_role = userRole;
	u.insert();
}

function createUserRole(role, user) {
	var userRole = new GlideRecord("sys_user_has_role");
	userRole.user = user;
	userRole.role = role;
	return userRole.insert();
}

function getRoleID(role) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_role");
	if (!gr.get("name", role))
		return null;
	
	return gr.sys_id;
}]]></script>
